attributes.action: Scrap plans to make the new Thames Gateway Bridge a toll bridge
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is unbelievable that motorist will have to pay to use the new thames gateway bridge. A new crossing in this area is long overdue and and as traffic increases the bridge will be needed to reduce congestion. If a toll is introduced surely the bridge would not realise its full potential. Also i believe that motorists confidence in toll bridges has been lost after the promise to cease the QE2 bridge toll was broken.
